title: Romaine and Watercress Salad with Roquefort Buttermilk Dressing
directions: In a large bowl toss together romaine, watercress, and radishes.
Serve salad with dressing on the side.
ingredients: 8 cups baby romaine leaves or bite-size pieces hearts of romaine, rinsed and spun dry
1 bunch watercress, coarse stems discarded and sprigs rinsed and spun dry (about 2 1/2 cups)
